long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Muslim Tab is an Islamic themed new tab page. Every time when you open a new tab, it displays a random verse from the Quran.
Introducing Muslim Tab, your personalized Islamic-themed new tab experience for your Browser. With Muslim Tab, every new tab you open reveals a random verse from the Quran, enriching your browsing journey with spiritual inspiration and reflection.

Features:
* MuslimTab supports 27+ languages/translations of the Quran.
* Auto-change verse: show new verse with every new tab.
* Next and previous verse control feature.
* Beautiful and classy backgrounds (21+ background images)
* Bangla,English and Arabic clock and date.
* Bangla,English and Arabic Zikir.
* Morning and Evening Adhkar
* Hijri Date.
* Quran Audio Play features.
* Quran Chapter short info.
* 20+ reciters to select.
* Element show and hide feature.
* Improved UI.
* Fix Bugs.
* Animation and more...
